main.title: Web Developer
main.description: I'm Brian, a frontend developer passionate about web design. I love learning and creating new experiences that improve user interaction.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: I've worked on lots of projects over the years, here are a few of them.

About.description1: I'm a web developer, oriented especially in front-end development. My expertise lies in building interactive web applications. I mainly work with technologies like React.js, JavaScript, TypeScript and Node.js
About.description2: I strongly believe in continuous learning and self-improvement, so I do my best to learn in any possible situation.

roles.title: Network & Svcs Operation
roles.description:
Responsible for the commissioning of infrastructure and customer access in Vodafone Key Account projects.
-Router (Cisco, Huawei, Teldat) and Switch Configuration.
-Configuration of customer services such as MPLS, VPLS, INTERNET, IPSEC, SDWAN, TRUNK, ELINE.
-Configuration of accesses based on technologies such as Radio links, PaP Fiber, 3G/LTE and Orlas.

roles.title: Network & Svcs Operation
roles.description:
Performing the duties of Network & Svcs Operation Associate to complete the ASIR course with on-site training. Responsible for infrastructure commissioning and customer access in Vodafone Key Account projects.
-Configuration of CPEs (Cisco, Huawei).
-Configuration of customer services such as MPLS and INTERNET.
-Configuration of accesses based on technologies such as Radio links, PaP Fiber, 3G/LTE.

roles.title: Freelance Web Developer
roles.description:
My specialization covers WordPress, CSS, HTML, JavaScript, TypeScript extending it now with ReactJS, creating advanced and dynamic web solutions. NodeJS and MongoDB complement my technical profile.
My focus is on innovation, quality, and adaptability in a constantly changing technological environment.

roles.title: Full Stack Developer
roles.description:
Performing the duties of Full Stack Developer to complete the DAM course with Workplace Training. During my internship I played an active role in the development of multiple projects, where I used a diverse set of technologies and programming tools, including Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML, CSS, React, VSCode, NetBeans and GitHub.
-My responsibilities ranged from writing clean and efficient code to implementing responsive user interfaces and optimizing application functionality to enhance the user experience.
-I collaborated closely with development teams to ensure timely delivery of projects following coding and design best practices.

roles.title: Frontend Developer
roles.description:
Developing Frontend Web Developer tasks to complete the DAW course with the Workplace Training. During my internship contract at I2C, I have the opportunity to work on the development of the company's main website and the websites of various internal projects.
My main focus is programming and web design, ensuring its functionality and usability.
This experience is allowing me to acquire new skills and knowledge in the field of web development, and I am excited to continue learning, especially about Front End.

Projects.title: Projects
Projects.description: These are the projects in which I have worked, I started making wordpress websites for a few companies and now I took the step to make code projects especially with MERN stack: Mongo, Express, React and Node.

ProfitLost.title: Profit & Lost
ProfitLost.description: Application under development for the management of personal finances.
ProfitLost.description2: Profit&Lost is a web application developed with modern technologies such as React, TypeScript, Node.js, Express, SASS, and MongoDB, designed to help users manage their personal finances efficiently. The platform allows users to keep detailed track of their accounts, financial movements, expense and income categories, and generate annual reports for comprehensive analysis.

WP.title: Wordpress Webs
WP.description: Some of the websites I have done in Wordpress.
WP.description2: Set of websites I made for several clients in Wordpress. Each project was custom designed and developed, taking into account the specific needs of each client. From personal blogs to corporate sites, I have worked on a variety of projects that have allowed me to hone my skills in web design and development on the Wordpress platform. My focus has always been to create functional, attractive and easy to navigate websites, ensuring client satisfaction with every delivery.

Calenbry.title: Calenbry
Calenbry.description: Application under development for appointment management.
Calenbry.description2: Calenbry is a web application developed with technologies such as React, TypeScript, Node.js, Express, SASS and MongoDB, designed to streamline scheduling and appointment management for professionals and businesses. The platform offers a variety of features, such as custom scheduling links, real-time availability management and integrations with third-party tools such as video conferencing and CRM systems. Calenbry supports team collaboration, enabling seamless coordination of meetings across multiple team members and departments.

TalentControlHR.title: TalentControl HR
TalentControlHR.description: An application under development for human resources management.
TalentControlHR.description2: TalentControlHR is a web application built with modern technologies like React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, MongoDB, and SASS, aimed at optimizing human resources management for companies of all sizes. The platform features key functionalities such as team creation and assignment, shift management, attendance tracking, absence management, and leave request handling. Additionally, TalentControlHR integrates with third-party tools and is designed to facilitate collaboration across departments. Its intuitive interface and advanced features make it an ideal solution for centralizing and simplifying human resources operations.
